00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 // Function: MappingComponentItem()
00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 MappingComponentItem::MappingComponentItem(EndpointDesignDiagram* diagram,
00046                                            LibraryInterface* libInterface,
00047                                            QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00048                                            QString const& instanceName,
00049                                            QString const& displayName,
00050                                            QString const& description,
00051                                            QMap<QString, QString> const& configurableElementValues,
00052                                            unsigned int id) : SWComponentItem(QRectF(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, 0),
00053                                                                               component, instanceName,
00054                                                                               displayName, description,
00055                                                                               configurableElementValues, 0),
00056                                                               portIDFactory_(), diagram_(diagram),
00057                                                               id_(id), oldColumn_(0), progEntitys_(),
00058                                                               platformPlaceholder_(0), platformCompItem_(0),
00059                                                               oldPos_(), conns_(), importedIcon_(0)
00060 {
00061     if (diagram_ != 0)
00062     {
00063         diagram_->addItem(this);
00064     }
00065 
00066     // Set basic graphics properties.
00067     setFlag(ItemIsMovable);
00068     setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xa5,0xc3,0xef)));
00069 
00070     // Create the platform component placeholder.
00071     platformPlaceholder_ = new PlatformPlaceholderItem(this);
00072 
00073     // Parse the component's design if the component is valid.
00074     if (component->getVlnv()->isValid())
00075     {
00076         VLNV designVLNV = component->getHierRef("kts_sys_ref");
00077 
00078         if (!designVLNV.isValid())
00079         {
00080             designVLNV = component->getHierRef("kts_sw_ref");
00081 
00082             // Add CPU to the component so that it can be previewed correctly.
00083             QList<QSharedPointer<Cpu>> cpus;
00084             cpus.append(QSharedPointer<Cpu>(new Cpu()));
00085             component->setCpus(cpus);
00086         }
00087 
00088         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libDesComp = libInterface->getModel(designVLNV);
00089         QSharedPointer<Design> design = libDesComp.staticCast<Design>();
00090         QMap<QString, ProgramEntityItem*> progEntityMap;
00091         
00092         foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, design->getComponentInstances())
00093         {
00094             // Retrieve the component model.
00095             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = libInterface->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00096             QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00097 
00098             if (comp == 0)
00099             {
00100 //                 emit errorMessage(tr("The component %1 was not found in the library").arg(
00101 //                                   instance.componentRef.name()).arg(design->getVlnv()->name()));
00102                 continue;
00103             }
00104 
00105             // Create the correct graphics item based on the SW type.
00106             switch (comp->getComponentSWType())
00107             {
00108             case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS:
00109                 {
00110                     ProgramEntityItem* progEntity = new ProgramEntityItem(comp, instance.instanceName,
00111                                                                           instance.displayName,
00112                                                                           instance.description,
00113                                                                           instance.configurableElementValues);
00114                     progEntity->setImported(instance.imported);
00115 
00116                     if (diagram_ != 0)
00117                     {
00118                         diagram_->onComponentInstanceAdded(progEntity);
00119                         progEntity->setPos(instance.position);
00120                         progEntity->setEndpointsExpanded(instance.endpointsExpanded);
00121 
00122                         // Set custom endpoint positions.
00123                         progEntity->setEndpointOrder(instance.portPositions);
00124                     }
00125 
00126                     connect(progEntity, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00127 
00128                     addProgramEntity(progEntity);
00129                     progEntityMap.insert(instance.instanceName, progEntity);
00130                     break;
00131                 }
00132 
00133             case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION:
00134                 {
00135                     // Discard any applications if the mapping component is not a CPU.
00136                     if (!componentModel()->isCpu())
00137                     {
00138                         continue;
00139                     }
00140 
00141                     // Find the corresponding interconnection to find the linked program entity.
00142                     int connIndex = 0;
00143 
00144                     for (; connIndex < design->getInterconnections().size(); ++connIndex)
00145                     {
00146                         if (design->getInterconnections().at(connIndex).interface2.componentRef ==
00147                             instance.instanceName)
00148                         {
00149                             break;
00150                         }
00151                     }
00152 
00153                     if (connIndex == design->getInterconnections().size())
00154                     {
00155                         // TODO: Error message to the output window.
00156                         continue;
00157                     }
00158 
00159                     Design::Interconnection const& conn = design->getInterconnections().at(connIndex);
00160                     Q_ASSERT(conn.interface2.componentRef == instance.instanceName);
00161 
00162                     ProgramEntityItem* progEntity = progEntityMap.value(conn.interface1.componentRef);
00163                     Q_ASSERT(progEntity != 0);
00164                     
00165                     ApplicationItem* appItem = new ApplicationItem(comp, instance.instanceName,
00166                                                                    instance.displayName,
00167                                                                    instance.description,
00168                                                                    instance.configurableElementValues,
00169                                                                    progEntity);
00170                     appItem->setImported(instance.imported);
00171 
00172                     if (diagram_ != 0)
00173                     {
00174                         diagram_->onComponentInstanceAdded(appItem);
00175 
00176                         connect(appItem, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)),
00177                             diagram_, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00178                     }
00179 
00180                     connect(appItem, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00181                     progEntity->setApplication(appItem);
00182                     break;
00183                 }
00184 
00185             case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM:
00186                 {
00187                     PlatformComponentItem* platformCompItem =
00188                         new PlatformComponentItem(comp, instance.instanceName, instance.displayName,
00189                                                   instance.description, instance.configurableElementValues,
00190                                                   this);
00191                     platformCompItem->setImported(instance.imported);
00192 
00193                     if (diagram_ != 0)
00194                     {
00195                         diagram_->onComponentInstanceAdded(platformCompItem);
00196                     }
00197 
00198                     connect(platformCompItem, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00199                     setPlatformComponent(platformCompItem);
00200                     break;
00201                 }
00202             }
00203         }
00204     }
00205     
00206     // Determine the correct height for the node.
00207     updateSize();
00208     updateComponent();
00209     updateNameLabel(name());
00210 }

00212 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00213 // Function: ~MappingComponentItem()
00214 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00215 MappingComponentItem::~MappingComponentItem()
00216 {
00217     // Remove the program entities.
00218     foreach (ProgramEntityItem* item, progEntitys_)
00219     {
00220         delete item;
00221     }
00222 
00223     // Remove this item from the column where it resides.
00224     SystemColumn* column = dynamic_cast<SystemColumn*>(parentItem());
00225 
00226     if (column != 0)
00227     {
00228         column->removeItem(this);
00229     }
00230 }

00257 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00258 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00259 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00260 void MappingComponentItem::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00261 {
00262     QGraphicsRectItem::mousePressEvent(event);
00263     setZValue(1001.0);
00264 
00265     oldPos_ = scenePos();
00266     oldColumn_ = dynamic_cast<SystemColumn*>(parentItem());
00267 
00268     // Begin the position update for the connections.
00269     foreach (ProgramEntityItem* progEntity, progEntitys_)
00270     {
00271         foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, progEntity->getEndpoints())
00272         {
00273             foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, endpoint->getConnections())
00274             {
00275                 if (!conns_.contains(conn))
00276                 {
00277                     conn->beginUpdatePosition();
00278                     conns_.insert(conn);
00279                 }
00280             }
00281         }
00282     }
00283 }
00284 
00285 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00287 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00288 void MappingComponentItem::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00289 {
00290     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00291     if (static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00292     {
00293         return;
00294     }
00295 
00296     QGraphicsItem::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00297 
00298     if (oldColumn_ != 0)
00299     {
00300         setPos(parentItem()->mapFromScene(oldColumn_->mapToScene(pos())));
00301         
00302         SystemColumn* column = dynamic_cast<SystemColumn*>(parentItem());
00303         Q_ASSERT(column != 0);
00304         column->onMoveItem(this, oldColumn_);
00305     }
00306 }
00307 
00308 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00309 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00310 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00311 void MappingComponentItem::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00312 {
00313     QGraphicsItem::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00314     setZValue(0.0);
00315 
00316     if (oldColumn_ != 0)
00317     {
00318         SystemColumn* column = dynamic_cast<SystemColumn*>(parentItem());
00319         Q_ASSERT(column != 0);
00320         column->onReleaseItem(this);
00321 
00322         oldColumn_ = 0;
00323 
00324         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd;
00325 
00326         if (scenePos() != oldPos_)
00327         {
00328             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new MappingCompMoveCommand(this, oldPos_));
00329         }
00330         else
00331         {
00332             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new QUndoCommand());
00333         }
00334 
00335         // End the position update for the interconnections.
00336         foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, conns_)
00337         {
00338             conn->endUpdatePosition(cmd.data());
00339         }
00340 
00341         conns_.clear();
00342 
00343         // Add the undo command to the edit stack only if it has at least some real changes.
00344         if (cmd->childCount() > 0 || scenePos() != oldPos_)
00345         {
00346             static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd, false);
00347         }
00348     }
00349 }

00351 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00352 // Function: onEndpointStackChange()
00353 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00354 void MappingComponentItem::onEndpointStackChange(int height)
00355 {
00356     setRect(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, TOP_MARGIN + height + BOTTOM_MARGIN);
00357 
00358     SystemColumn* column = dynamic_cast<SystemColumn*>(parentItem());
00359     
00360     if (column != 0)
00361     {
00362         column->updateItemPositions();
00363     }
00364 }

00366 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00367 // Function: addProgramEntity()
00368 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00369 void MappingComponentItem::addProgramEntity(ProgramEntityItem* item)
00370 {
00371     item->setFixed(!componentModel()->isCpu());
00372     item->setParentItem(this);
00373 
00374     progEntitys_.append(item);
00375     VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(progEntitys_, item, TOP_MARGIN, SPACING);
00376     VStackedLayout::setItemPos(progEntitys_, item, 0.0, TOP_MARGIN, SPACING);
00377     updateSize();
00378 
00379     // Create the bus interfaces for the endpoints.
00380     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, item->getEndpoints())
00381     {
00382         endpoint->createBusInterface(this);
00383     }
00384 
00385     emit contentChanged();
00386 }
00387 
00388 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00389 // Function: ()
00390 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00391 void MappingComponentItem::updateSize()
00392 {
00393     // Update the application item positions.
00394     VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(progEntitys_, 0.0, TOP_MARGIN, SPACING);
00395 
00396     // Update the component's size based on the item that is positioned at
00397     // the lowest level of them all.
00398     qreal bottom = TOP_MARGIN;
00399 
00400     if (!progEntitys_.empty())
00401     {
00402         bottom = progEntitys_.back()->y() + progEntitys_.back()->boundingRect().bottom();
00403     }
00404 
00405     setRect(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, bottom + BOTTOM_MARGIN);
00406 
00407     SystemColumn* column = dynamic_cast<SystemColumn*>(parentItem());
00408 
00409     if (column != 0)
00410     {
00411         column->updateItemPositions();
00412     }
00413 
00414     // Update the location of the platform component (and the placeholder).
00415     platformPlaceholder_->setPos(0.0, bottom + SPACING);
00416 
00417     if (platformCompItem_ != 0)
00418     {
00419         platformCompItem_->setPos(platformPlaceholder_->pos());
00420     }
00421 }
00422 
00423 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00424 // Function: onMoveItem()
00425 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00426 void MappingComponentItem::onMoveItem(ProgramEntityItem* item)
00427 {
00428     setZValue(1001.0);
00429 
00430     // Calculate the height of the application item stack.
00431     qreal stackHeight = progEntitys_.first()->boundingRect().height();
00432 
00433     for (int i = 1; i < progEntitys_.size(); ++i)
00434     {
00435         stackHeight += progEntitys_[i]->boundingRect().height() + SPACING;
00436     }
00437 
00438     // Restrict to horizontal center and clamp the vertical range.
00439     qreal y = std::min<qreal>(std::max<qreal>(TOP_MARGIN, item->y()),
00440                               TOP_MARGIN + stackHeight - item->boundingRect().height());
00441     item->setPos(snapPointToGrid(0, y));
00442 
00443     VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(progEntitys_, item, TOP_MARGIN, SPACING);
00444 }
00445 
00446 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00447 // Function: onReleaseItem()
00448 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00449 void MappingComponentItem::onReleaseItem(ProgramEntityItem* item)
00450 {
00451     setZValue(0.0);
00452     VStackedLayout::setItemPos(progEntitys_, item, 0, TOP_MARGIN, SPACING);
00453 }

00455 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00456 // Function: removeProgramEntity()
00457 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00458 void MappingComponentItem::removeProgramEntity(ProgramEntityItem* item)
00459 {
00460     // Remove the bus interfaces from the mapping component.
00461     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, item->getEndpoints())
00462     {
00463         endpoint->removeBusInterface(this);
00464     }
00465 
00466     progEntitys_.removeAll(item);
00467     item->setParentItem(0);
00468     updateSize();
00469 
00470     emit contentChanged();
00471 }

00475 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00476 void MappingComponentItem::setPlatformComponent(PlatformComponentItem* item)
00477 {
00478     platformCompItem_ = item;
00479 
00480     if (platformCompItem_ != 0)
00481     {
00482         platformCompItem_->setParentItem(this);
00483         platformCompItem_->setPos(platformPlaceholder_->pos());
00484     }
00485 
00486     emit contentChanged();
00487 }

00497 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00498 // Function: save()
00499 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00500 bool MappingComponentItem::save(LibraryInterface* libInterface)
00501 {
00502     // Create the design.
00503     QSharedPointer<Design> design(new Design(componentModel()->getHierRef("kts_sys_ref")));
00504 
00505     QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances;
00506     QList<Design::Interconnection> interconnections;
00507 
00508     // Add the platform component item to the instance list if set.
00509     if (platformCompItem_ != 0)
00510     {
00511         Design::ComponentInstance instance(platformCompItem_->name(), platformCompItem_->displayName(),
00512                                            platformCompItem_->description(),
00513                                            *platformCompItem_->componentModel()->getVlnv(),
00514                                            platformCompItem_->pos());
00515         instance.imported = platformCompItem_->isImported();
00516         instance.configurableElementValues = platformCompItem_->getConfigurableElements();
00517 
00518         instances.append(instance);
00519     }
00520 
00521     // Add the program entity items to the instance list.
00522     foreach (ProgramEntityItem* item, progEntitys_)
00523     {
00524         Design::ComponentInstance instance(item->name(), item->displayName(), item->description(),
00525                                            *item->componentModel()->getVlnv(), item->pos());
00526         instance.imported = item->isImported();
00527         instance.configurableElementValues = item->getConfigurableElements();
00528         instance.endpointsExpanded = item->isEndpointsExpanded();
00529 
00530         // Save endpoint positions (actually just the order of the endpoints).
00531         for (int i = 0; i < item->getEndpoints().size(); ++i)
00532         {
00533             instance.portPositions[item->getEndpoints().at(i)->getName()] = QPointF(0, i);
00534         }
00535 
00536         instances.append(instance);
00537 
00538         // Save the attached application.
00539         if (item->getApplication() != 0)
00540         {
00541             ApplicationItem* appItem = item->getApplication();
00542 
00543             Design::ComponentInstance appInstance(appItem->name(), appItem->displayName(),
00544                                                   appItem->description(), *appItem->componentModel()->getVlnv(),
00545                                                   appItem->pos());
00546             appInstance.imported = appItem->isImported();
00547             appInstance.configurableElementValues = appItem->getConfigurableElements();
00548 
00549             instances.append(appInstance);
00550 
00551             // Add the applink interconnection.
00552             Design::Interface iface1(item->name(), "app_link");
00553             Design::Interface iface2(appItem->name(), "app_link");
00554             interconnections.append(Design::Interconnection(item->name() + "_link_" + appItem->name(),
00555                                                             iface1, iface2, QList<QPointF>()));
00556         }
00557     }
00558 
00559     design->setComponentInstances(instances);
00560     design->setInterconnections(interconnections);
00561 
00562     // Save the design and the component.
00563     libInterface->writeModelToFile(design);
00564     libInterface->writeModelToFile(componentModel());
00565     return true;
00566 }

00568 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00569 // Function: getEndpoint()
00570 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00571 EndpointItem* MappingComponentItem::getEndpoint(QString const& fullName)
00572 {
00573     // Retrieve the program entity name from the full name (the part before _mcapiBus_).
00574     QStringList names = fullName.split("_mcapiBus_");
00575 
00576     if (names.size() != 2)
00577     {
00578         return 0;
00579     }
00580 
00581     foreach (ProgramEntityItem* item, progEntitys_)
00582     {
00583         if (item->name() == names.at(0))
00584         {
00585             return item->getEndpoint(names.at(1));
00586         }
00587     }
00588 
00589     return 0;
00590 }

00595 void MappingComponentItem::updateNameLabel(QString const& text)
00596 {

00600 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00601 // Function: isMapped()
00602 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00603 bool MappingComponentItem::isMapped() const
00604 {
00605     return getConfigurableElements().contains("kts_hw_ref");
00606 }

00608 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00609 // Function: updateComponent()
00610 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00611 void MappingComponentItem::updateComponent()
00612 {
00613     SWComponentItem::updateComponent();
00614 
00615     // Show an icon if this is an imported SW component.
00616     if (isImported())
00617     {
00618         if (importedIcon_ == 0)
00619         {
00620             importedIcon_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/imported.png"), this);
00621             importedIcon_->setToolTip(tr("Auto-synced"));
00622             importedIcon_->setPos(100, 6);
00623         }
00624     }
00625     else if (importedIcon_ != 0)
00626     {
00627         delete importedIcon_;
00628     }
00629 }
